query: WITH entities AS (SELECT payment_id, created_at, id FROM core_obligation_installments WHERE ((payment_id = $1) AND (COALESCE((created_at, id) < ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $5 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_obligation_installment_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.created_at desc, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
